commands.name: az oracle-database cloud-exadata-infrastructure create
commands.syntax:
az oracle-database cloud-exadata-infrastructure create --cloudexadatainfrastructurename
                                                       --resource-group
                                                       --zones
                                                       [--compute-count]
                                                       [--customer-contacts]
                                                       [--display-name]
                                                       [--location]
                                                       [--maintenance-window]
                                                       [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                       [--shape]
                                                       [--storage-count]
                                                       [--tags]
examples: az oracle-database cloud-exadata-infrastructure create --name <name> --resource-group <RG name> --zones <2> --compute-count 2<> --display-name <display name> --shape Exadata.X9M --storage-count <2> --location <location>

commands.name: az oracle-database cloud-exadata-infrastructure delete
commands.syntax:
az oracle-database cloud-exadata-infrastructure delete [--cloudexadatainfrastructurename]
                                                       [--ids]
                                                       [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                       [--resource-group]
                                                       [--subscription]
                                                       [--yes]

commands.name: az oracle-database cloud-exadata-infrastructure list
commands.summary: List CloudExadataInfrastructure resources by subscription ID.

commands.name: az oracle-database cloud-exadata-infrastructure update
commands.syntax:
az oracle-database cloud-exadata-infrastructure update [--add]
                                                       [--cloudexadatainfrastructurename]
                                                       [--compute-count]
                                                       [--customer-contacts]
                                                       [--display-name]
                                                       [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                       [--ids]
                                                       [--maintenance-window]
                                                       [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                       [--remove]
                                                       [--resource-group]
                                                       [--set]
                                                       [--storage-count]
                                                       [--subscription]
                                                       [--tags]
                                                       [--zones]

commands.name: az oracle-database cloud-exadata-infrastructure wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
